title: Extreme fps problems
body: Hi, I have a huge problem. Over the years I have had bad internets many times so I know how it feels to have high ping and stuff, but since last month I am having fps issues that I suspect are not connected with my trash internet. The game is stuttering, in teamfights it just disconnects, the sound is distorted and its just bloody unplayable. Can anyone help me please? Whats the problem ?

replies.body: If your game is stuttering and you're hearing some messed up sounds, it might be a sign that some of the game files may have become corrupted. Go ahead and grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the force repatch option. Let me know if you have any questions!
